survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Electric Vehicle (EV) Public Charging Stations Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from EV owners regarding their satisfaction with public charging stations to identify areas for improvement and enhance user experience.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format to ensure clarity and ease of response.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use public EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a public EV charging station? (Select up to 3)
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is not 'Never'.
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow respondents to prioritize their preferences.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox with a maximum of 3 selections.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a public EV charging station? (Select up to 3)
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is not 'Never'.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of public EV charging stations in your area?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is not 'Never'.
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of public EV charging stations in your area?
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is not 'Never'.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for public EV charging stations?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is not 'Never'.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture detailed feedback for improvement.
